website_summaries.verdict: These bouncing club chairs offer supreme comfort with a lightweight design.
pros: Rigid chairs are also available in this style
Wrought iron frame for extreme durability
Neutral design to match any decor
cons: Bolts tend to loosen over time, causing the chairs to wobble

customer_reviews.title: For the price of these chairs I expect better quality. Would not recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I spent $400 on two pair, they are bending and leaving rust stains on my concrete. For the price of these chairs I expect better quality. Would not recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but lower weight capacity than description says.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I just put them together and the quality is there. I kind of want to take a star away because the description says the weight capacity is 300 lbs., which is one of the main reasons why I picked them. When they arrived, the weight capacity says 250 lbs. That is a big difference! But they are very nice, good quality and an awesome price. Over all I'm still pretty pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Quiet reading time begins!
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs! Very sturdy and comfortable! I managed to put them together, needed help from a friend to hold the pieces-they were heavy (which is a good thing)! Had a little difficulty with delivery but was handled professionally and everything worked out in a very timely manner! Thank you for great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to sit in
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to sit in. Durable construction. Nice lean in the back. I have a set of matching chairs from this company on the back porch for the past 2 years and they are excellent. Nice cushion as well. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: karthik

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chairs
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this set for my moms enclosed patio. Took us about 2 hours to assemble with the included hardware and tools. It’s reasonably weighted and the brick red cushions really pop. It’s not a heavy set, but for the price it definitely will suit our needs. We also purchased a table and the matching conversation set. All together 4 people took 2 hours to assemble it all.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Longbine

customer_reviews.title: Great patio chairs
customer_reviews.text: Received chairs and assembled immediately. Easy to assemble and very sturdy. Cushions are comfortable and chairs look and feel like they will provide years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, comfy patio chairs
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chairs for the money. Easy and quick to put together (good instructions!), comfy and obviously good quality fabric. You won't find a better deal on these types of chairs anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Canelakes

customer_reviews.title: Lovely chairs - you put together - a little bit of work but do-able
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy chairs but hard to put together. Got in touch with company and they are sending replacement parts. Holes were not completely drilled through parts. So screws wouldn’t go in. Company very helpful and quick to respond. Love the cushions. Very pretty chairs. Received parts and chairs are great now.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Leming

customer_reviews.title: perfect deck chairs
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect patio chairs. They are so comfortable, they bounce a little bit, and are so cute.. they're timeless. They can go with almost any decor. And they are plush! LOVE these chairs. They seem sturdy too, like they will last along time, I will addend this review if they break within the next year:)
customer_reviews.author: tatalin0608

customer_reviews.title: These are incredibly sturdy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly sturdy and comfy. Easy to put together.. They are as attractive as they are comfortable. They sit a the perfect height with a lot of butt-room. These are great!! I would definitely recommend them - and may purchase a second set.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine E. Roush

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chairs
customer_reviews.text: They are in deed very comfortable and very easy to put together They look very good and for a big guy like me they are solid and comfortable. I do like them
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for 2 years for chairs like this to replace the swivel chairs that came with my set. These chairs are very sturdy and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: david Coen

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Went together well. First chair took 1 hour, second chair took 10 minutes. Tried not to strip a screw thread, but still did one. Looks great as expected and are comfortable for patio furniture
customer_reviews.author: bp

customer_reviews.title: sturdy well built
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 12 chairs, they all came packed well and in good condition - I have assembled 8, its easy. We spend most of our time at home on our patio (winter and summer) - works well for both dining and comfort
customer_reviews.author: JUDY

customer_reviews.title: Cloud Mountain Patio sits
customer_reviews.text: A very nice, comfortable and robust set of patio sits.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect.. easy to assemble.. I also purchased and assembled the matching glider...
customer_reviews.author: NLE

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. Cold Mountain is one of best companies ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Cold Mountain is one of best companies to work with. Very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Alexis G. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Patio Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and of great quality. Took about 2 hours to put together. Packaging was super.
customer_reviews.author: Onlineshoppa

customer_reviews.title: Great value and height is fine for table
customer_reviews.text: Love the chairs. I was worried about the height when I ordered them, but they are totally fine for eating at the table. Great value. I will end up getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. We had 1 arm that had an issue. Contacted the company and had a replacement piece within a week. Great item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to spruce up the patio. Also purchased a heat lamp and outdoor firepit. You can see how well the chairs go with the fire, and they are very comfortable and not too hard to assemble. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Very happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: The chairs and table combo was the best purchase I have made in a long time. They arrived quickly and were a breeze to put together with the enclosed instructions. I bought the "Brick" color and they look beautiful and fit perfectly on my apartment porch. Very sturdy and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Laney

product_meta.title: Cloud Mountain Set of 2 Patio Club Chairs Outdoor Dining Chairs Wrought Iron Set Garden Dining Bounce Seating Chair, Gradient Brown
feature_bullets: INCLUDE: Set of 2 outdoor dining chairs(A little bounce)
MATERIAL: Solid tempered wrought iron frame
DIMENSION: 26.4" x 25.4" x 34.4"(LxWxH); 1000+ people like it on our Instagram
WEIGHT CAPACITY: Max loading weight for chair up to 250 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars30 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
